featured.text: Most of the area is covered by woods, where bird species are so _____ that it is a paradise for birdwatchers.

definition.zh_def: 觀鳥者，專門觀察和研究鳥類的人。
definition.en_def: A person who observes and studies birds as a hobby or for scientific purposes.
definition.example: The birdwatcher quietly set up his binoculars to spot rare species in the forest.
